channel.title: Lost Legacy Returns | Oldschool Pk/Eco |24/7 VPS Hosted | 317 |
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ggGRkki.gif[/img]
Website [url=http://www.Lostlegacyreturns.com]Lost Legacy Returns[/url] Forums [url=http://www.Lostlegacyreturns.com/Forums]Login[/url] Webclient [url=http://www.Lostlegacyreturns.com/webclient]Lost Legacy Returns[/url]
[COLOR="#FF8C00"]I have decided to stop working on my source as i found it slowly becoming Ardi's source, and thought I might as well download his for a base. There are a shit tonne of updates that have been added/will be added to set the release to our server apart.
Credits: Ardi, Myself and apparently Valiant for the client.[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]Old source will be released within a month at rune-server.org [/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fqc7mXQ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gMTV9Rs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rYlmjdS.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ldJEdal.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ap1GJGZ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YdwgEZB.png[/img]
-Warriors Guild coming soon
[/CENTER]

item.title: Lost Legacy Returns | Oldschool Pk/Eco |24/7 VPS Hosted | 317 |
item.dc:creator: @Runic_Souls Runic Souls
item.description:
@Runic_Souls wrote:

[quote=“shank beast, post:10, topic:542284”][quote author=pofroze link=topic=661161.msg4436959#msg4436959 date=1405381584]
doesnt matter what base you chose… Anyways we need players! (ardis source and this one are alot different now)
[/quote]

You are wrong… Nothing new, nothing good…[/quote]

If you want new you could always go play EOC.

EDIT: Not sure how good that would be though. lel

2nd EDIT: I forgot to mention. We do have Warrior’s Guild up now. I’ll remind the owner to post the pictures he’s taken of it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Runic_Souls Runic Souls
item.description:
@Runic_Souls wrote:

Islaynoobs:

Ardi base is shit.

I actually like this server. I’ve played a LOT of oldschool servers but haven’t managed to actually CONTINUOUSLY played on one until I found LLR. I suggest trying it at least once before you pass judgement.
